item.title: Tips on Java
item.description: How to run executable Java Jar files Here we have a sample1 project that shows how to build and execute java programs as a Jar file. ├─ com └── vlv ├── demosample └── GetProps.java Above tree structure show the java source and class objects in their package structure. Here is the sample code for GetProps.java package com.vlv.demosample; import java.lang.*; import java.security.*; public class GetProps { public static void main (String [] args) { String s; try { System.
